meta.name: Tone-Emotion Mapping System
meta.description: Maps Mandarin tones to emotional archetypes and sentence patterns for memorable mnemonics
meta.source: Synthesized from cognitive research on dual-coding and emotional memory enhancement

1.name: First Tone (High-Level)
example_stories: A stream flows cheerfully singing 'Chuan!' in three happy channels!
The Yangtze water flows cheerfully singing 'Jiang!' through the work!

mnemonic_cues.spatial: Top of scene, sky-level, elevated platform

2.name: Second Tone (Rising)
example_stories: In the rice field, farmers ask 'Tian? Why so muddy?' curiously!
A lake of water questions 'Who? Hu?' curiously like reckless whiskers!

mnemonic_cues.visual: Character tilting upward, arrow pointing up
mnemonic_cues.spatial: Climbing stairs, ascending mountain, rising sun

3.name: Third Tone (Dipping)
3.physical_quality: low, dipping, contemplative, like a sigh
example_stories: The soil takes shape, whispering 'Too' softly - a vivid image to remember!
See how the water forms to swim? It whispers 'Yong' softly like ripples spreading!

mnemonic_cues.visual: Character sinking into ground, curved valley

4.name: Fourth Tone (Falling)
4.physical_quality: sharp, decisive, like a command or exclamation
example_stories: Two parallel lines stack up, yelling 'ERR!' when you count twice!
Inside the box, your four items command 'See this!' sharply!

mnemonic_cues.visual: Character dropping, arrow pointing down, guillotine
mnemonic_cues.spatial: Falling from height, diving, hammer striking

5.name: Fifth Tone (Neutral)
example_stories: A belly of flesh and soil says 'doo' neutrally round!

usage_guide.principle: Every mnemonic story should encode the tone through emotional verb/adverb choice

examples.tone1_yī: A single proud line stands alone, singing 'Yeeee!' cheerfully - this is number one!
examples.tone2_shí: A cross at ten keeps asking 'Shi? Why ten?' curiously!
examples.tone3_wǔ: Five strokes converge at the crossing point, whispering 'Woo' softly!
examples.tone4_sì: Inside the box, four items command 'See this!' sharply!
